field.label: Enabled
field.comment: Enable the Veratad module here.
field.tooltip: Once enabled the Veratad module will work for all stores.

field.label: Address to Verify
field.comment: Select which address to verify.

field.label: Username
field.comment: Veratad API Username.

field.label: Password
field.comment: Veratad API Password.

field.label: Rules
field.comment: AgeMatch Rule Set Name.
field.tooltip: AgeMatch5_0_RuleSet_YOB, AgeMatch5_0_RuleSet_YOB_SSN, AgeMatch5_0_RuleSet_YOB_SSN_ADDR

field.label: Endpoint
field.comment: Set the AgeMatch endpoint.

field.label: AgeMatch Failure Title
field.comment: This is the title a user will see when they fail AgeMatch first attempt.

field.label: AgeMatch Failure Subtitle
field.comment: This is the subtitle a user will see when they fail AgeMatch first attempt.

field.label: AgeMatch Second Attempt Success Title
field.comment: This is the title a user will see when they PASS AgeMatch second attempt.

field.label: AgeMatch Second Attempt Success Subtitle
field.comment: This is the title a user will see when they PASS AgeMatch second attempt.

field.label: AgeMatch Second Attempt Failure Title
field.comment: This is the title a user will see when they FAIL AgeMatch second attempt.

field.label: AgeMatch Second Attempt Failure Subtitle
field.comment: This is the title a user will see when they FAIL AgeMatch second attempt.

field.label: AgeMatch Attempts Exceeded Title
field.comment: This is the title a user will see when they have no more attempts.

field.label: AgeMatch Attempts Exceeded Subtitle
field.comment: This is the subtitle a user will see when they have no more attempts.

field.label: AgeMatch Second Attempt Not Eligible Title
field.comment: This is the title a user will see when they are not eligible for a second attempt.

field.label: AgeMatch Second Attempt Not Eligible Subtitle
field.comment: This is the subtitle a user will see when they are not eligible for a second attempt.

group.label: Customer Groups
group.comment: Select groups to exclude from verification.
